name: Crimson Survival
description:
More power, more zombies and a royal battle with players from around the world.

Multiplayer Game
In Crimson Survival, you must survive among zombies and online players.
Detailed game locations with unique parameters and biome. Constantly advancing zombies and eager to stay alive players.

The game space is gradually decreasing - there will be only one player left. Be it.

Offers
Look in every corner, in every cellar and box, in order to find unique items. Which will increase the chance to stay alive.

Checkpoints
Capture control points, do not let other players take over and dominate you.
